Here's a great one for your show, Steve, it has someone, don't know who,  
saying; "Jesus" then after I say something a group of what I believe to be  
Angels, say either, "he is or it is" then the person, says His name in 
Aramaic,  "Yeshua!"  Listen, maybe you can hear it, hope so.   sf
